Fluxonium QubitÂ¶

The Hamiltonian of the fluxonium qubit [Manucharyan2009] in phase basis representation is given by

\[H=-4E_\text{C}\partial_\phi^2-E_\text{J}\cos(\phi-\varphi_\text{ext}) +\frac{1}{2}E_L\phi^2.\]

Here, \(E_C\) is the charging energy, \(E_J\) the Josephson energy, \(E_L\) the inductive energy, and \(\varphi_\text{ext}=2\pi \Phi_\text{ext}/\Phi_0\) the external flux in dimensionless form. The Fluxonium class internally uses the \(E_C\)-\(E_L\) harmonic-oscillator basis [Zhu2013] with truncation level specified by cutoff.

An instance of the fluxonium created as follows:

fluxonium = sc_qubits.Fluxonium(EJ = 8.9,
                                EC = 2.5,
                                EL = 0.5,
                                flux = 0.33,
                                cutoff = 110)

Here, flux is given in dimensionless units, in the form \(2\pi\Phi_\text{ext}/\Phi_0\).

Calculational methods related to Hamiltonian and energy spectraÂ¶

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.hamiltonian(self)

Construct Hamiltonian matrix in harmonic-oscillator basis, following Zhu et al., PRB 87, 024510 (2013)

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.eigenvals(self[,Â â¦])

Calculates eigenvalues using scipy.linalg.eigh, returns numpy array of eigenvalues.

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.eigensys(self[,Â â¦])

Calculates eigenvalues and corresponding eigenvectors using scipy.linalg.eigh.

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.get_spectrum_vs_paramvals(â¦)

Calculates eigenvalues for a varying system parameter, given an array of parameter values.

Wavefunctions and visualization of eigenstatesÂ¶

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.wavefunction(self,Â esys)

Returns a fluxonium wave function in phi basis

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.plot_wavefunction(self,Â esys)

Plot phase-basis wave function(s).

Implemented operatorsÂ¶

The following operators are implemented for use in matrix element calculations.

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.n_operator(self)

Returns the \(n = - i d/d\phi\) operator in the LC harmonic oscillator basis

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.phi_operator(self)

Returns the phi operator in the LC harmonic oscillator basis

Todo

implement cos(phi), sin(phi)

Computation and visualization of matrix elementsÂ¶

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.matrixelement_table(â¦)

Returns table of matrix elements for operator with respect to the eigenstates of the qubit.

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.plot_matrixelements(â¦)

Plots matrix elements for operator, given as a string referring to a class method that returns an operator matrix.

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.get_matelements_vs_paramvals(â¦)

Calculates matrix elements for a varying system parameter, given an array of parameter values.

sc_qubits.Fluxonium.plot_matelem_vs_paramvals(â¦)

Generates a simple plot of a set of eigenvalues as a function of one parameter.
Manucharyan2009

Manucharyan et al., Science 326, 113-116 (2009), https://arxiv.org/abs/0906.0831.

Zhu2013

Zhu et al., PRB 87, 024510 (2013)
